::Battera::
She heard Vulios on her link. She looked at CyberShark and 
smiled. "The three musketbots are back again." She transfered the 
sector co-ordianants to Vulios.


::KitKat::
She looked at Starscream. "Please join me, We are on our way to meet 
with some new comers to the planet. I may need you for back up."





--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Alloran2@a... wrote:
> 
> :::Vulois/Starscream:::
> 
> ::Vulois was in the cave, thinking about things.  He had regained 
his old 
> memory, and thought about everything that happened in his life on 
this world. 
>  He remembered when he first came, a messenger from the matrix.  
Evil.  He 
> contacted Predacons to join his group.  The first to answer his 
call was 
> Soundwave.  Soundwave came to his mountain lair and became a TM3.  
Soon 
> Vulois and Soundwave became very good friends.  battera also joined 
him.  
> After he failed his treachery against Hell Beast, he built an 
embassy and 
> turned over a new leaf.  he decided to strive for peace.  By this 
time, 
> Battera had joined the Destrons along with Cybershark.  Soundwave 
was left in 
> his quarters, thinking that Vulois had died.  Vulois contacted his 
three 
> friends and they came promptly to him.  he then assigned them 
factions for 
> peace talks.  Battera went with the Maximals and became almost part 
of them.  
> Cybershark had very little luck with the Predacons.  Soundwave went 
to the 
> Alliance.  While Soundwave was there, Vulois went into a meditation 
state, 
> and when he woke up, he discovered that Soundwave had been brutally 
killed by 
> the Alliance.  many things happened after that.  he trained a young 
bot named 
> Child, the Skyscorchers joined him, Eagle Eye died, GuardienAngel 
and 
> AngelNemises were destroyed, and many other strange things.  
Leading up to 
> him faking his own death and joining the Alliance.  Now he didnt 
know how he 
> feeled.  He opened up his comm::
> Vulois: Battera, Cybershark, would you please come to my 
coordinates so we 
> can discuss some things?
> --------------------------------------------------------------------
----------
> 
> ---------------------------------------------
> ::Starscream was flying around, wondering what had happened to his 
comrades.  
> Soon his energy signature detector went off::
> Computer: Kitkat's energy signature detected.
> ::He flies down and transforms to robot mode.  he walks up to 
Kitkat::
> Starscream: Kitkat!  Im sorry for disapeering like that, but, WHAT 
HAS 
> HAPPENED WHILE I WAS GONE?
